channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NSCLC Survival Benefit Seen With EGFR-TKI + Chemo
item.description: Median PFS benefit was just over 3 months in patients with EGFR-mutant NSCLC who had tumor suppressor gene co-mutations. Medscape Medical News

item.title: First-Line Osimertinib Plus Chemo Extends Survival in NSCLC

item.title: How Eczema Could Help You Eat Healthier
Aging and Fitness Myths That Might Be Holding You Back
item.description: Staying active at any age could boost your health, mood, and longevity. Learn the truth behind exercise myths and how movement supports healthy aging.
